item.description:
Discussion of the Law of Attraction and practical examples of how it's played out in our daily lives, and whether we are attracting the people, situations, jobs and relationships that we desire or that we don't desire.

Learn how to:
Stop attracting things that we don't want
Increase abundance in our lives
Removing negative vibration (doubt) by our practice of allowing
Why affirmations may not be raising our vibration

Looking forward to another lively discussion!
item.name: Discussion of Applying Law of Attraction in our daily lives
